Products.METATAG_Title: Girls Pullover Hoodies | Girls Sun Protective Hoodie | UV Skinz
Products.Photo_AltText: Cute Pullover Beach Hoodie for Girls with UV Protection
Products.ProductFeatures:
Our Girlâ€™s Pullover Hoodie is the perfect choice for lightweight sun protection you can grab on the go. Made from our full stretch knit pique fabric, these cute pullover hoodies are quick drying, breathable and super soft to the touch. Featuring a front kangaroo pocket, snap closure at neck, and stylish contrast stitching. Our girls pullover hoodies are a must have for your child's sun protective wardrobe. Throw on the hood for even head and neck coverage. This clothing is certified UPF 50+.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Lightweight, Quick Drying Pique Knit
  • Breathable Sun Fabric
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Flat-Lock Seams
  • Snap at Base of Hoodie
  • Kangaroo Front Pocket
  • Body Length for Size 6 is 18" as Measured from Side Neck to Hem
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported

Products.ProductName: Womens Active Swim Shorts
Products.METATAG_Description: Easy movement and sensational style are the hallmarks of UV Skinz womenâ€™s active swim shorts. Play with confidence in shorts that stay in place. Shop now.
Products.METATAG_Title: Women's Active Swim Shorts, UV Sun Protective Shorts - UV Skinz
Products.Photo_AltText: Chlorine Resistant Summer Swimwear for Women - SPF/UPF 50+
Products.ExtInfo:
• Rinse Shorts in Cool Water after Every Use
  • Machine Wash Shorts in Cold Gentle Cycle with Mild Soap and Lay Flat to Dry
  • Do Not Spin Dry, Soak, Bleach, Dry Clean, Iron or Store Shorts when Wet
  • Remove All Sand Grains in Garment by Carefully Washing and/or Stretching and â€˜Tappingâ€™ Sand out of Garment when it is Dry
  • Avoid Rough Surfaces such as Concrete and Rough Swimming Pool Decks as these may Damage Your Garment
  • Avoid Harsh Chemicals in Heated Spas and Saunas as these may Breakdown the Fibers of Your Garment
  • Avoid Direct Contact with Sunscreen as this may Stain the Fabric
Products.ProductFeatures:
Freedom of movement meets adorable style in the UV Skinz womenâ€™s active swim shorts. These babies are one of our most versatile and popular bottoms for ladies, and you can easily see why.

 

These UV Skinz women's active swim shorts are comfortable and fitted but not constricting, providing a flattering look along with as all the freedom you need to swim, hike, paddle board, bike or head to the gym. The buttery soft matte swim knit fabric is combined with milk silk, making these womenâ€™s swim shorts as comfy as they are attractive. The high-quality material also comes equipped with an anti-chlorine treatment, saltwater resistance and powerful UPF 50+ sun defense.

 

Many different colors are at your service, taking you where you need to go all summer long. Get your UV Skinz active swim shorts today.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Quick Drying, 4-Way Stretch, Swim Knit Sun Fabric
  • Our Swim Knit Sun Fabric Moves with You
  • Fully Lined for Great Coverage
  • Flat-Locked Seams for Comfort
  • Mid-Rise Waist
  • Size Medium Inseam: 6"
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported

Womens Classic Water Jacket - Navy Blue - S
Products.ProductKeywords: water jacket, zipper, women, womens, women's, jacket, long sleeve
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: Our casual, breezy jacket is perfect for wearing over your swimwear or a favorite tee to stay protected from the sun. Great for water aerobics too! Made out of our certified UPF 50+ breathable sun fabric, it is quick drying and chlorine and salt water resistant. The jacket has a two-way zipper and front pockets, flat lock seams throughout with contrast piping. Relaxed fit. Sleeves have thumb hole at opening to keep sleeves in place during activities and for added protection around the hand when needed.
Products.TechSpecs:
• Certified UPF 50+ breathable sun fabric
  • Lightweight, quick drying microfibre knit
  • Chlorine and salt water resistant
  • Raglan cut long sleeves
  • Two-way zipper
  • Front pockets
  • Flat-lock seams
  • Relaxed fit - stretch fabric
  • Thumb hole at sleeve opening

Sleeves have thumb hole at opening to keep sleeves in place during activities and for added protection around the hand when needed.
Products.TechSpecs:
• Certified UPF 50+ breathable sun fabric
  • Lightweight, quick drying microfibre knit
  • Chlorine and salt water resistant
  • Raglan cut long sleeves
  • Two-way zipper
  • Front pockets
  • Flat-lock seams
  • Relaxed fit - stretch fabric
  • Thumb hole at sleeve opening

Products.ProductName: Kids Sunny Flap Bucket Hat
Products.METATAG_Description: You won't want to leave home without this hat to keep your child protected from the sun. Bright solids match perfectly with our other boys and girls products.
Products.METATAG_Title: Sunny Flap Sun Protective Bucket Hat for Kids - UPF 50+
Products.Photo_AltText: Comfortable Kids Sun Hat Head Protection
Products.CUSTOM_METATAGS_OVERRIDE: <title>Sun Cap with Neck Flap | Hats with Neck Cover | UV Skinz</title> <meta name="description" content="You won't want to leave home without this hat to keep your child protected from the sun. Pair this hat with sun protective clothing from UV Skinz." />
Products.ProductFeatures:
You won't want to leave home without this hat to keep your child protected from the sun. This sun cap with neck flap offers unique sun protective features keeping kids covered where its most needed. Flap covers neck and can be tucked away when it isn't needed. Cinching strap at crown is adjustable for the perfect fit. Bright solids match perfectly with our other boys and girls products. This sun cap with neck flap is certified UPF 50+.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Lightweight, Quick Drying Microfibre Knit
  • Cinch at Crown for Perfect Fit
  • Neck Flap Can be Tucked Away When Not in Use
  • Imported
